title: Stridsland Has Restocked its Narrow Wide Rings
content:
Stridsland‘s narrow wide chainrings (440 kr.) are back in stock. These colorful rings are available for  94, 104, and 110 bcd for all your old-crank-rejuvenation needs. They come in 32 through 40 tooth counts, nine colors, including black and silver, are non-directional – works in both directions, 7 through 12-speed compatible, singlespeed compatible too, and are made in Poland.

The post Stridsland Has Restocked its Narrow Wide Rings appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
